name: Read Korean game Hangul punch
description: I want to follow the Korean stars tweets!  But , I can not understand ..Hangul characters . I can not read completely ...  For such myself, I made!  Its Practice mode  to practice the basic Hangul characters one by one. You will master the configuration of the Hangul characters by this mode!  When you master the structure of a character , you will want to be able to read the word ! At that time, please challenge  bout mode to play against the rival!  In the  bout mode  , the words of food relationship will appear. If you do not master reading of a word, you can not win the bout!  Now, Lets master the Korean characters in boxing ! Then, I become a follower of Korean star , Ill catch completely up-to-date information !   < How to Play > Hangul characters are displayed on the screen . Select a hangeul punch.  If it is correct , punch will hit! Great! When wrong in the bout, counter will hit you!  If you understand the structure of a character, then you can punch! Do your best!
